text: Jupiter Ghosh is a cricketer from Bangladesh. He was born on 22nd July 1989 in Bagerhat, Khulna. Jupiter Ghosh is a Bangladeshi first-class and List A cricketer. He is a right-handed batsman and right-arm bowler. Ghosh is an all- rounder and plays as a right-handed batsman. He is currently playing for Khulna Division. == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Cricketers from Khulna Division
title: Jupiter Ghosh
